name: Wreckage (itch)
description:
Hi all!

Game #3 of my Game-A-Day self isolation challenge.
Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, the entirety of the UK is in self-isolation lockdown.
During this time, I have challenged myself to produce a small game each day.


In this game, you control a wrecking ball bulldozer, attempting to sweep as many of the objects off the edge of the platform as possible.
